title: Teaching Methodology Practical Competency Enhancement: Science Learning Design Based on Multimedia Wikis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively author wiki texts on science topics with peers and integrate at least three multimedia elements
Learners can propose methods for applying science theories to practical situations through project-based activities
Learners can improve the accuracy, creativity, and applicability of wiki content generated through peer assessment to at least 80% achievement levels
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
